transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes, good afternoon, main Kadir baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Sir, aapse hamari last time baat hui thi 25th ko.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai? 24th ko bhi baat hui thi, theek hai na? Aur maine aapko suggest kiya tha sir ki jo aapki jo concern person hai, jo IndiaMART ki inquiry jo dekhte hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Theek hai na? Unko boliye ki woh aaj se 10 din ki buylead inquiry wagera uthaye aur usko jaise buyer se connect karte hain usko update karke mujhe share kare. Taki main apni concern team ko.
Customer: Haan, maine kar diya. Haan, mail, mail kar diya jo lead hai.
Executive: Suniye sir ji. Suniye sir ji, main aapko bata raha hun. Aapki hamari jo communication hua tha, hamari do baar communication hui thi. Ek communication humne dikhaya aapko communicate hua tha 17 October ke baad hui thi. Theek hai? Aur 17 October ke baad hone ke baad fir se maine aapko connect kiya tha toh aapne bola tha ki hamara maine unko update kiya tha pata nahi woh unhone kar rahe hain ya nahi kar rahe. Fir hamari 25 October ki 21 October ko fir baat hui. Fir uske baad se main aapko bata dena chahunga ki abhi inhone jo detail mujhe share kiya hai na, abhi yeh service beech mein inhone use toh kiya hi nahi. Aur main bata deta hun aapko ki last inhone service jo use kiya tha woh 25 tarikh ko kiya tha. Uske baad se koi service use hi nahi kiya. Aur aaj inhone service use kiya hai toh char buylead uthaya hai. Toh beech mein.
Customer: Nahi nahi, buylead toh beech mein, beech mein bhi, beech mein bhi kiya tha. Toh hum log ka.
Executive: Nahi. Main sir mere paas data open hai. Yeh 26 tarikh se lekar aur do tarikh tak.
Customer: Sir aapke paas data open hai agar aapko aap zabardasti bulwana chahoge toh aisa toh possible, aisa toh possible nahi hai na?
Executive: Aapko lag raha hai sir ki 26 se leke 2 tarikh tak inhone buylead inquiry uthaya hai?
Customer: Toh hum logo ka agar relative inquiry nahi aayega toh utha utha ke kya fayda hai boliye. 25 karke utha ke toh koi fayda nahi hai.
Executive: Toh ek kaam kijiye sir ji, inhone keval 1 tarikh ko do buylead uthaya tha uske baad se koi buylead inquiry nahi uthaya. Abhi main agar concern team ko aapka jo bheja hua hai na, woh agar main bhejunga na toh recent mein koi buylead inquiry usme se koi dikhai nahi raha hai.
Customer: Toh main kya.
Executive: Aapko.
Customer: Isme aap jo, aapko, hum aapko jo data bheja hai, woh data ko check karke, woh data check karke aap dekho, tally karke aap dekho. Jo maximum call.
Executive: Sir, sir ek minute sir. Tally karke maine dekha. Maine sir aapko yeh bola tha ki dekho recent mein agar hamara koi buylead inquiry pichle ek saptah ka agar hum buylead inquiry jo hamare product se related hai, woh agar uthayenge usse hum call karenge aur jo update feedback milega.
Customer: Are bhai aapka hi nahi hai, aapka hi nahi hai.
Executive: Dekhiye sir ji. Sir aap keh rahe hain ki koi inquiry hi nahi aati hai. Aaj ke date mein aapke bande ne char inquiry uthaya. Haan. Service hi use karenge tabhi toh inquiry milega sir. Usi pe toh feedback milega hame. Tabhi toh main aage concern team ko.
Customer: Are bhai service nahi bol raha hun. Hum inquiry nahi kiya. Hum, hum aapko likh ke diya hai. Hum aapko udhar likh ke diya hai. Bar bar aapko aisa karoge toh aisa possible nahi hota hota hai.
Executive: Sir, woh main agar check kar raha hun na pichle jo 10 din se hum yaha par dekh raha hun usme se keval ek hi inquiry match kar raha hai baki inquiry koi match recent ka nahi hai.
Customer: Aap khud socho us jagah pe.
Executive: Last, last 10 din ka hi inquiry ka details hum aapko bheje, bheje hain jisko phone, jisko phone kiye hain usko details hi bheje, bheja hai. Hum bana ke nahi bheja hai usko.
Executive: Sir main, main woh nahi keh raha. Main keh raha ki jo aap keh rahe hain na main yeh bhi keh raha hun ki aapke jo bhi person hai jo IndiaMART ki inquiry.
Customer: Bhaiya yeh na close kar dijiye. Hum na pareshan ho chuka hai. Hum na pareshan ho chuka hai. Hum bar bar complaint karte karte thak chuka hai. Bol ke bol ke thak thak chuka hai. Yeh band kar dijiye. Hum bilkul interested nahi ho. Pichle bar bhi ek hi baat hua tha. Pichle bar mein bhi ek, ek hi baat hui thi. Hum log ka jo kaam hai woh kaam agar nahi milega toh karke toh baat karke koi fayda nahi hai.
Executive: Sir aapko agar inquiry agar jo aap keh rahe ho ki inquiry nahi mil raha.
Customer: Bhaiya jo inquiry aata hai woh relative inquiry nahi hai properly. Bole hum galti se kar diya. Mera bacho ne kar diya. Theek hai na click click click ho gaya tha. Toh aisa aisa falana dikhana aisa aisa bol raha tha. Competitor ka bhi inquiry tha. Ek company ka tha. Aapko likh ke bheja, bheja hai report mein.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Mera, mera samne report banaya.
Executive: Sir main, main wohi keh raha hun sir ji. Main aapki concern ko na nahi kar raha hun. Main keh raha hun sir ji ki aap khud socho ki agar.
Customer: Humare aapko agar, agar aapko hum, hum aapko agar 10 din ka bheja hai aapko pasand nahi hai 10 din ka report, chhod dijiye.
Executive: Sir wohi main keh raha hun sir ji ki jo 10 din ka jo aap report hai recent mein toh already humne 7 din toh service use nahi kiya.
Customer: Toh recent mein dekho, dekho.
Executive: 7 din ka use kiya ki nahi kiya woh relative nahi aayega toh use karke kya fayda hai?
Executive: Sir aisa, aisa toh, sir ek baat batao sir ji aisa ho sakta hai kya ki keval 7 din mein ek bhi inquiry na mile aur ek din mein char inquiry aapko mil jata hai aaj ki date mein?
Customer: Are bhai jo inquiry aata hai zabardasti lene ke liye hum, hum usko bola hai.
Executive: Main zabardasti ki baat nahi kar raha. Sir zabardasti ki baat nahi kar raha hun. Main keh raha hun ki agar main agar samne se agar customer se baat bhi karunga sir ji agar feedback cross check karunga.
Customer: Bhaiya abhi cancel kar dijiye. Ek kaam karte hain mera account, mera account aapke paas access hai. Theek hai na? Jo aapko, jo aapko, theek hai na? Jo aapko lagta hai, jo aapko inquiry hai aap le lo. Theek hai na?
Executive: Sir aisa nahi kar sakte. Hamare paas right nahi hai. Main inquiry nahi utha paunga aapka.
Customer: Haan, main close karna chahta hun. Hum IndiaMART se thak chuka hun. Close karna chahta hun. Review bhi diya, diya hai.
Executive: Sir, review bhi diya hai. Sir aap sab kuch diye hain lekin agar main.
Customer: Close karna chahta hun. Hum do saal se use kar raha hun. Do saal, do saal se ek bhi theek dhang ka inquiry mere paas nahi hai jo jis se kaam ho.
Executive: Sir main uski baat nahi kar raha. Main keh raha hun ki agar aap.
Customer: Hum usi mein hi baat, baat karega. Nahi hum usi mein hi baat karenge. Aisa baat, baat mat boliye. Hum usme baat nahi kar raha hun.
Executive: Sir, us, uske tak ki main apni concern team se fir woh concern ko raise karke kaise response le paunga aap bhi batao jo purana inquiry ka aap detail doge toh purana detail ka inquiry kaise nikal paunga main?
Customer: Toh purana, purana inquiry agar purana hai kitna saal ka? Kitna saal ka purana hai?
Executive: Are sir aap, aap khud socho na sir ji aap agar usi cheez ko customer se kisi se kaise cross check kar payenge agar jo recent mein baat hui hogi usi se toh hum baat karke le payenge na fir se.
Customer: Recent mein agar, agar maan ke chalo 10-12 din ka hi diya hai, 15 din ka diya hai toh 15 din ka aap cross check nahi kar sakte?
Executive: Nahi sir ji, pichle 7 din ka toh data hai hi nahi. Isme se koi inquiry hai.
Customer: Chhod dijiye. Chhod dijiye sir. Chhod dijiye.
Executive: Aap unko boliye ki recent mein abhi aapne use kiya hai toh 7 din se woh detail share kiya ja raha hai.
Customer: Nahi aur nahi karenge. Aapka naukar nahi hai. Aapka naukar nahi hai. Hum aapko mail likha hai.
Executive: Sir, please.
Customer: Mail likha hai. Aapka good name kya hai? Aapka good name kya hai?
Executive: Good name, sir ek minute sir. Aap suniye pehle. Mera kehne ka matlab yeh nahi hai sir ji ki aapke naukar yeh nahi keh raha hun. Yeh kehna.
Customer: Hum aap se baat nahi karna chahta hun. Hum higher, hum dobara mail karta hun. Theek hai na? Humko paisa refund chahiye. Hum dobara mail, mail karta hun aur us, uske baad India ko kaise sala dikha, dikhaya jata hai humko malum, malum hai.
Executive: Rukiye phone.
Customer: Theek hai?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Wants to close the IndiaMART account.

- Requests a refund.



Resolution:

- Executive tried to explain the buylead inquiry process.

- Executive mentioned the customer's recent activity.

- Executive offered to cross-check feedback with customers.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Customer will send a mail again.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, account closure, complaints
